New Brightcove Academy Courses

New Docs

  • Title: Download Button Plugin
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the download plugin for Brightcove Player. This plugin will allow you to download an mp4 file of the video or a text file of the video transcript. - New Product Feature!

  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Plugins
  • Title: Interactivity Viewer Plugin
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about using the interactivity plugin to allow usage of Brightcove Interactivity functionality. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/interactivity-viewer.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Plugins
